channel.title: NGIN Weekly on Ngin: Search Engine Based Ecosystem
channel.description: Recent content in NGIN Weekly on Ngin: Search Engine Based Ecosystem

item.title: What are we building?
item.description: This is the beginning of ngWeekly I believe that before you read this NGIN Weekly, you have already got a general understanding of what the project wants to do through our official website and the original whitepaper on github. This week we will make a brief review of the original project and then start to talk about how we are going to design our new backend daemon. Review how Arseniy led NGIN to “errors” Let’s review how Arseniy#8378 led Ngin to “errors”.
